rules_text:
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Tap target creature. It loses all abilities until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
{3}{W}: Ionize this creature. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](If it isn’t an artifact, this creature becomes a 0/0 artifact creature and gains “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”)[/i]
